card_text: If this card is in your hand: You can destroy 2 other monsters in your hand and/or face-up field, including a FIRE monster, and if you do, Special Summon this card, and if you do that, you can banish 1 monster from your opponent's field or GY, if both the destroyed monsters were FIRE. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can add 1 non-FIRE Wyrm monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "True King Agnimazud, the Vanisher" once per turn.
